titleStmt.title: A discourse unto his royal highness James, Duke of Albany and York: when intending from Scotland. Presented by a loyal hand

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by William Caron, and are to be sold by John Calderwood stationer, over against the Main Guard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

person.persName: John Calderwood stationer, over against the Main Guard
